definition: to check in (at a hotel etc)
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

sentences.english: The master bedroom of Room 318 had changed little since his stay 17 years earlier.
sentences.chinese: 318房的主臥室和他十七年前入住時相比變化不大。

sentences.english: A person of many histories of into live to make Qingdao become a city of the most young history.
sentences.chinese: 許多歷史名人的入住使青島成爲最年輕的歷史名城。

sentences.english: I stayed in the largest of the 3 -suite with king bed.
sentences.chinese: 我入住的是其中最大的一個套間帶有特大號牀。

sentences.english: One day, forgiveness will tiptoe in and take up gentle occupancy in your heart.
sentences.chinese: 總有一天，寬容會悄悄地來，溫柔地入住你的心房。

sentences.english: Housing occupancy standards fall short, the right not to pay the property management fee?
sentences.chinese: 達不到入住標準的房，物業管理費有權不交嗎？

sentences.english: The Roosevelt family poses for the camera two years after moving into the White House.
sentences.chinese: 這是羅斯福佳通入住白宮兩年以後的照的相片。

sentences.english: On Wednesday, six new tenants moved into my home.
sentences.chinese: 這個星期三，我們家入住了六位新“房客”。

sentences.english: Check-in to your favorite places and let your friends know where you at!
sentences.chinese: 入住到你喜歡的地方，讓你的朋友知道你在哪裏。

sentences.english: The hotel is a very convenient place to stay if you are visiting Mont Saint-Michel.
sentences.chinese: 入住這家酒店可方便您遊覽聖米歇爾山。

sentences.english: The passenger enters and returns a house all may complete through the simple operation.
sentences.chinese: 旅客入住和退房都可以通過簡單的操作完成。

sentences.english: Hotel occupancy rose once again in the first nine months of 2003.
sentences.chinese: 酒店入住率於二零零三年首九個月再度攀升。

sentences.english: Thank you for choosing to stay in Jinling hotel during Mid Autumn Festival.
sentences.chinese: 非常感謝您選擇入住南京金陵飯店。

sentences.english: The reservationist wants to know the guest's date of arrival and date of departure.
sentences.chinese: 預訂員想知道客人的入住日期和離店日期。

sentences.english: To check in, you should at first go to the reception desk to register.
sentences.chinese: 要入住的話，你應當首先去總檯登記。

sentences.english: Dear guests, Thank you for your stay at Sunny Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的賓客，非常感謝您入住香溢大酒店。

sentences.english: The initiative to cancel, for some reason can not stay, call in advance to cancel.
sentences.chinese: 主動取消，因故不能入住，可提前電話取消。

definition: to check out of a hotel room
to reside/to dwell/to live in a place/resident in
to decorate/interior decoration/to fit up/to renovate
